titleStmt.title: Good newes from Canaan Full of heauenly comfort and consolation, for all those that are afflicted either in bodie or minde. With a proofe of true repentance for the same. By William Cowper, minister of Gods word, and B. of Galloway.
titleStmt.author: Cowper, William, 1568-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shops, at the South doore of Pauls, and at Britaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shops, at the South doore of Pauls
